column4: pluufsy: can you start it with just "mysql -u root -p" from a command line?
that returns ERROR 2002: Can't connect to local MySQL server through socket '/var/run/mysqld/mysqld.sock' (2)
it sounds to me like you have the mysql client, but not the server.  How did you upgrade, BTW?
via the instructions in the wiki, in synaptic. changed all hoary to breezy.
